messages.subject: My email account
messages.msgSnippet: This is really OT but I am having a problem with my email service and they don t seem to be able to fix it, hence I an in search of another email service. The
messages.messageBody:
This is really OT but I am having a problem with my email service and
they don't seem to be able to fix it, hence I an in search of another
email service. The problem I am facing is that I can only send email
from the net and I receive my email through an email program on my
comp. So when I reply to a post it doesn't get sent. It just sits
there on my comp using up space. I have been looking for a service in
which I can send email through my email program but can't seem to be
able to find one that gives the stmp info. so that I can do this.
Does anyone have any suggestions as to where to turn for this type of
free email service? Corallyn P.S. This is why I have been so quiet
lately.
